name: Hunter's Legacy (itch)
description:
ATTENTION: BEST PLAYED IN FULL SCREEN MODE!!!

Movement: WASD

Aim and Shoot: Mouse and LMB

Dodge roll: RMB or Space

Interact (Door, buy upgrades ) : E

Stats panel: Tab

Hunter's Legacy is a roguelite shooter. When you die , some of your gold and upgrade will leave to your kid, they'll continue the legacy to honor the family!!
